website_summaries.verdict: A good pick for evening, and for those who like scents that aren't overpowering and that have notes on the sweet side.
pros: The perfect perfume for evening, since it has been described as boldly sweet and spicy
A good pick for ladies who aren't into floral top notes
cons: For a parfum, it could linger a bit longer
Occasional bottles have seemed somewhat watered down

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume. This product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume. This product, however, is sold by Amazon, and it's defective or not authentic. There's barely a scent and it's gone by the time I leave my house for work. The authentic product smells great and its long-lasting. Scarves I've worn weeks ago still have the scent on them. This product is FAKE. Also, Amazon won't let me return it. I'm stuck with a bottle of nothingness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Something’s not right...
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with this formula. I have been wearing this for 8 years and this is the first time I’ve ordered it online. I’m wondering if I got a bad batch. The middle and bottom notes are not right. They’re too fruity making it smell cheap, unlike the heady deep scent that smells expensive that it usually is. And the longevity is not near what it should be. Like I said, I know this perfume inside and out after using a small bottle once every 3 months for the last 8 years. This one isn’t right. I’m going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: bBest smell on earth IMO
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume and has been for years. Hard to find locally and always get an icky feeling when I'm about to buy online since you never know how long the product has sat or if it is real. Some reviews always state not the real thing. I have been blessed that mine has, so far, been the real deal and I have enjoyed this perfume very much through the years. Thank you seller for the real thing and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell coming from a Man
customer_reviews.text: Hard to write a good review for this one. I got it for the wife. 10 years ago before kids we didn't have 2 nickles to rub to gather. Since then we are doing A LOT better. I wanted to surprise her with this because it was something I bought her back in our struggling times. She loved it. And I personally love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Guns4all

customer_reviews.title: I wish my body chemistry worked with it
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume, just not on me. I bought it because a co-worker used it and it smelled divine! I would walk past her office and could smell it (from 6 feet away). But when I sprayed it on and it dried, all I smelled was the litter in my childhood hamster's cage. So I gave it to my sister and now I get to compliment her every time she wears it. She just puts one spray on each wrist in the morning. Her co-workers love it too.
customer_reviews.author: CanD

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: This smells like Crystal Noir for about 2 minutes and it’s gone. This is really watered down. I have used Crystal Noir for 20 years and this is not the real deal. With the authentic parfum I can put it on in the morning and still get compliments in the evening this didn’t make it out of the bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Dorris R

customer_reviews.title: It smells very good, but may not be the original
customer_reviews.text: I loved versace noir de toilette for years, and I know its smell from Sephoora and Ulta. But this one is different. I received de parfume noir, then I called the versace store and they told versace noir doesn’t have de parfume, only de toilette exist. I get upset and returned it. However, to be honest this perfume smells good, too. So I’m not sure, if the difference between the smell is because of being the parfume or not being authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is the best in the world! Never have I had so many compliments and everytime I wear it people start to gather to find where that smell is coming from. It gets no better than this ! This is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dedra R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing or very old?
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume, it is my favorite scent right now, but either this isn't genuine or I received a very aged bottle. It loses its scent within an hour or two and the real deal will last all day. That's the gamble with online purchses.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Girl

customer_reviews.title: Was fake :(
customer_reviews.text: Boooo a fake, got refunded. Have worn this for years and first time ordered thru Amazon was not real product. Didn’t smell at all (parfum should be quite strong), caused my (not at all sensitive) skin to break out, and stained my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bogus!!
customer_reviews.text: It said 3 times on the packaging it was perfume and I got toilette spray. Hassle to return and probably not a chance it will be the right thing this time. Very frustrated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bev Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfume did not smell the same as when I purchase in the store.
customer_reviews.text: I love Versace Noir - It is the only perfume I wear. But this bottle only smelt like alcohol. I was so disappointed. I would have purchased 10 more bottles of this if it was the original formula. I’m not sure how they can have the same exact packaging- maybe it was expired.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not official
customer_reviews.text: I had brought the sample, and it smelled sooooo good, I decided to go for a bigger bottle, so I purchased it. Why does the bigger version smell like cheap deodorant? If you dont mind walking around smelling like cheap deodorant,this is for you, purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: erie

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was duped...
customer_reviews.text: This smells nothing like the real Versace Crystal Noir. It's like someone forgot to put in all the low notes. It smells of the high floral notes, which evaporate quickly, and alcohol. I love Crystal Noir, but Amazon doesn't have a reliable source for it. Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Best parfum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always go with eau de parfum.... never settle. This is the BEST PERFUME ever!!! I receive compliments every day about how amazing I smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Always sunny in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this parfume. The scent is long lasting, subtle, and erotic! Perfect for office or night time.
customer_reviews.author: DrPYGLML

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sexy night time fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. The cardamom and ginger smell the strongest on me backed by its floral scents. It's definitely more of a night time fragrance. Has a spicy/floral/slightly sweet smell that you can smell farther than arms length on me and it lasts for several hours. Very sexy. I get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This perfume gets a lot of compliments, but more importantly, I really enjoy the fragrance. It starts spicy and slowly tones down to a coconut fragrance with deeper richer tones of sandalwood. It is not your basic boring floral! The scent is rich and complex, and it lasts for quite a long time. I love it and hope this perfume will stay on the market for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Young Shopper 123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this perfume from this seller. The first bottle I purchased I thought it was great. However, this second bottle I feel like is different. There is no scent by the end of the day. Makes me question the authenticity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent , wear time iffy , not sure it’s authenic...
customer_reviews.author: Ulrike H. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Favorite perfume
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite perfume, especially to wear in the fall and winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle Boyer

customer_reviews.title: She was very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my stepmom for Christmas. She was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Soubi Stein

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this perfume for years and this is not authentic or is expired.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: Fake 100%
customer_reviews.text: Looks real but is 100% fake. Spend the extra and buy the real stuff!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a change try this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn obsession for years at least 30 and decided I'm tired of being obsessed so I tried this one and I love it and other people love it on me
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I expected... wore it the other day and a young asked me with enthusiasm... what is that you are wearing. It smells so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this perfume for years and Amazon's price was great. Delivery was faster than expected
customer_reviews.author: judygush

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Compared old bottle and this one. I think this is fake or smells completely different.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent !! This is the only perfume I’ve ever gotten multiple times . It has a strong scent and definitely stronger than the spay.
customer_reviews.author: anasheh

customer_reviews.title: Get compliments
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments all the time. Very spicy but still sultry.
customer_reviews.author: Wit's End

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but in an hour the smell is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent..
customer_reviews.text: This perfume is wonderful, i get complement daily from the pretty scent.. I used Versace for years, this one is #1
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast , the scent is amazing. Packeaged amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Zenae Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Good price and she loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this scent since she first smelled it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: percy mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Not legit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this parfume for years. This one smells like the original one but it’s not that long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Iveta Petrova

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite fragrances. The value is amazing. This is not available in major departments stores as a perfume only as an ODT. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerdiva

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a perfume online but was more than satisfied. It came earlier, everything was original and the quality was excellent! Most important, my wife was happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Danail T.

customer_reviews.title: this is a very soft scent which fit my type ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a very soft scent which fit my type. I was looking for a scent that can last for 12 hours and I found it in this Versace.
customer_reviews.author: aweni

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Product was a bit on the strong side when first sprayed but then totally gone by the end of the day I thought. Nice smell
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance and the fragrance lasts all day. I will only buy perfume in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is awesome. The smell of this perfume is so delicious. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tefi Customer

customer_reviews.title: really good price for original product
customer_reviews.text: It is original, lasts all day, really good price for original product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the smell
customer_reviews.text: however, disappointed that it does not last long... :( Perhaps its just me but it seems as if this was watered down...
customer_reviews.author: Mindy A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Versace Crystal Noir
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Not too overpowering. Got this at Amazon for a great deal less money than where I tried it out at a specialty shop.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Napoleone

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: my girl love it. one of her favorite night parfums

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love it. so good product ,it has great smell
customer_reviews.author: Mzia Shoshiashvili

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Purchased this product for my girlfriend after smelling ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Purchased this product for my girlfriend after smelling it in Costa Rica....WOW! Compliments all over town. Long lasting scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Genson

customer_reviews.title: not original
customer_reviews.text: not the original. The bottle is different from the one I bought from a Versace store when I was in Italy. smells the same, but don't last as long.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Made in Italy. Scent doesn't last long... Gone in an hour....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it eigher
customer_reviews.text: I thought because this was the parfume, it would be better the the toilette, but it was not. No smell to it and didn't last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: crystal noir
customer_reviews.text: m like this item and recommending it to others, has very fresh and nice aroma, very feminine and light, it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: eka

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite perfume.
customer_reviews.text: Vercase crystal noir has given me many compliments. This is by far my favorite perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Matson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The Bestttt love the smell and I brought it for a great price omggg!!! If you don't have it go purchase it
customer_reviews.author: KingA!!!

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This perfume is FAKE!!! The lid does not have the Versace logo and it falls right off. Plus, the spray is so watered down it only lasts 3 seconds. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwishi12

customer_reviews.title: Quality fragrance is in the nose of the beholder.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the question should be, "Is it original or 100% authentic?" I think the question is, "How old is it and in what conditions was it stored". Mine was very weak and the fragrance lasted only a very short time and, of course, it is not returnable. But, the bottle is pretty. It's not just me. Read some of the reviews on any 100% authentic perfume on here. Spending a lot of money for an unknown quality with no recourse. I will point out that I have received some very good quality perfumes, but they are usually from other stores advertising on Amazon. Pay your money and take your chance.
customer_reviews.author: S&W Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only perfume I have used for 10 years! This product is a fake! Smells a bit different (still smells nice) and does not last long at all. Very sad that I was lied to/fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Wynand

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent.  However, the scent doesn't last long inside the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is fantastic, but my wife complains that the fragrance goes away after a short period if she doesn't use it quick enough. So she's left with half a bottle of liquid without a fragrance. This is the second bottle of this she has had this complaint about.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyD

customer_reviews.title: Head Turner!
customer_reviews.text: When I wear this perfume people stop and ask me what I am wearing! ITs a winner for women.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fake!! Excited at first until the scent fades in 1 HOUR... buyer be ware!!
customer_reviews.author: PAM HALL

customer_reviews.title: Too strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest perfume ever!! Even a drop reeks for hours. It was embarrass in, people complained. I gave it to a friend. She spritzed it in the air(as I did) and the same thing happened! Yuck Yuck Yuck!!!! I only gave it a 1 star rating cuz I couldn't submit this without one.
customer_reviews.author: doreen

customer_reviews.title: a Scent that says strong, sexy, and warm
customer_reviews.text: Feminine and sexy without any floral or fruity notes. Finally!!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mama

customer_reviews.title: It’s not over whelming
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome scent that last. Even when you can’t smell it anymore, it still lingers
customer_reviews.author: sammie

customer_reviews.title: Sorry. I wish it wasn't so, but...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS FAKE! I love the smell, and I so wanted to save some money but this is watered down, it fades in 20 min. Ridiculous! I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Muller

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite smell EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love parfume a that more crisp and clean like a cologne, this one fits the bill! It smells like the freshest scent in the world to me! Not citrus' not floral, just plain CLEAN I can't describe it any other way but if you like to smell fabulous I highly recommend! I purchased this big bottle as a second one as my first bottle was purchased as a small bottle in a dept store so I could smell it first! Highly recommend! Worth EVERY "scent" lol
customer_reviews.author: TellMeg

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent. It’s doesn't last as long as I would like but I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom. She loves the fragrance and gets lots of compliments. I also have this perfume. It is a safe bet for a lot of ladies. Not floral or overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice aroma, not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it as does her relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz Wubbles

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this perfume smells soooo good. well, if you're the type that likes flower or fruit perfumes, then this one isn't for you. i received this product two weeks after placing the order, and i must say, i'm quite pleased with it. it was well wrapped and in a good condition. good tip: there's a good tip to know if the perfume you bought is brand new. the tip is you have to press on the bottle. the first two sprinkles should be empty. if perfume sprayed on the first press, you were deceived.
customer_reviews.author: miss-hana

customer_reviews.title: Not strong like a perfume either
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure I got the true product. Packaging was suspect as was the top to the perfume bottle. Not strong like a perfume either. I guess you get what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Goldylocks

customer_reviews.title: ... just me who got a sampe that doesnt smell like what i see on a friend who got it ...
customer_reviews.text: i think i received a fake product but this could be just me who got a sampe that doesnt smell like what i see on a friend who got it from a different place.
customer_reviews.author: jairam munuparthi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance because it's delicate and mixes well with my body scent, that's always important.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume for winter Generally I liked it more than bright crystal that I used it for summer This one is one of my favorite for winter as well as Gucci guilty; Gucci guilty intense, euphoria original, obsession original
customer_reviews.author: Ladynred

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL FRAGRANCE.
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. I have had many compliments regarding this fragrance when I wear it to work. It actually stays on me during my whole shift and longer. Too me, it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KAY L. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great perfume! I always get compliments on how good it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing & my wife love
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Arrived in factory conditions. Smells amazing & my wife love it
customer_reviews.author: Fawaz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bottle of Versace's Crystal Noir and is now my favorite perfume. I get compliments from men and women every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: drs

customer_reviews.title: Noir
customer_reviews.text: This is a decadent & lovely fragrance. I hv been impressed also with the value of my purchase. I received a 3oz bottle & paid considerably less than I would have at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: LiLu Moon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I get compliments on how good it smells on me all the time,even from strangers!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl @Luv

customer_reviews.title: Attention grabber....
customer_reviews.text: ......I am a fanatic when it comes to fragrances and I fell in LOVE with this scent!!! A friend of mines wore it and I absolutely had to get it. Although I know it smells different on everyone I still wanted it and I am so glad I got it. Ever since I put it on everyone around me says "someone smells really good" "great fragrance" "what are you wearing" So I know I scored with this one. Funnily enough, I can never seem to smell this fragrance on me but everyone else does, so hey I'm not complaining :)
customer_reviews.author: Empress P

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: One of my most favorite fragrances! Love, Love, Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the smell. And cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell. Ordered it again. And it's so cheaper here.
customer_reviews.author: Sudha G

customer_reviews.title: A must have on my vanity
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite perfumes. It has a classy scent and I always receive compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: harleygrl915

customer_reviews.title: I love this fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance! I receive many compliments when I wear it. Then again, can't go wrong with any Versace perfume! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good smell Parfum!
customer_reviews.text: I love Versace Crystal Noir because it gets good smell all the day and I can use it everywhere and everytime. My daughter also likes this. I think that it is suitable for woman.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful smell
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves it, i will buy more soon i cannot keep enough of it , she uses it every day all most.

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine. For awhile....
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance of this perfume. It doesn't last very long though - a couple of hours at most. But maybe that's just on me. Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I like strong perfumes that last on me. Fills my requirements beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: another chemically cloying scent
customer_reviews.text: my own fault- i read reviews for an hour but never smelled it. so heavy and same as many other scents. i'd thought versace might have a better formula--but i guess not. gave me an instant headache. i gave it away immediately-- to a teen who will wear anything labeled 'cologne.'.
customer_reviews.author: julesbell27

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I receive a lot of compliments when I wear this perfume. It stays on all day!

product_meta.title: Versace Crystal Noir By Gianni Versace For Women Eau De Parfum Spray, 3-Ounces
product_meta.description: Versace Crystal Noir By Gianni Versace For Women Eau De Parfum Spray, 3-Ounces. Head - Blackcurrant, Black Fig, Violet
feature_bullets: All our fragrances are 100% originals by their original designers.
This item is by designer Gianni Versace.
Due to manufacturer packaging changes, product packaging may vary from image shown.
Versace Crystal Noir by Gianni Versace is the right fragrance for the woman looking to impress.
Whether you choose to wear this perfume out with friends or colleagues, Versace Crystal Noir is sure to add a bit of mystery to your evening.
Deep purple bottle with princess-cut glass cap.
Notes: gardenia, tuberose, amber, sandalwood and orange blossom.
